services.title: Our Comprehensive Services
services.subtitle: Aladheed AlRashidiya provides a wide array of Goverment services tailored to meet your specific needs. Explore how we can assist you.

items.title: Sharia\nMarriage
items.description: RAALC specializes in Shari'a marriage registration, providing personalized assistance in line with Islamic law. We ensure thorough documentation and legal compliance for a smooth registration process.

items.title: Civil\nMarriage
items.description: RAALC simplifies civil marriage registration in Dubai, ensuring precise completion of all paperwork. Our experienced team guides you through the entire process, meeting all legal requirements.

items.title: Inheritance
items.description: RAALC provides comprehensive inheritance support for Muslims and non-Muslims. We assist with property transfers, will executions, and resolving disputes among heirs through legal channels.

items.title: Real Estate
items.description: RAALC assists with property claims, including compensation for project cancellations or developer delays. We also support legal actions related to outstanding payments and other real estate matters.

items.title: Notary Service
items.description: Our notary services ensure the confidentiality of your sensitive documents. We authenticate affidavits, powers of attorney, wills, sponsorship letters, and more. Remote services are available, and client visits can be arranged when necessary.

items.title: Marital Matters
items.description: Facing marital issues? RAALC provides support in divorce cases, legal agreements, child custody, and contesting judgments. We assist with family guidance and acquiring nafaka during and after marriage.

items.title: Parentage
items.description: Having trouble obtaining a birth certificate? Aladheed AlRashidiya guides you through the legal process, from initial submission to final court decisions, for both UAE Nationals and foreigners, including support for single mothers.

items.title: Commercial Service
items.description: Aladheed AlRashidiya specializes in claims related to unpaid invoices or bounced cheques. We assist with claim registration, legal notices, and document archiving. We also help refute opposing claims and facilitate the execution of legal notices.

determination.title: Unique Needs of <1>People of Determination</1>
determination.subtitle: We provide highly specialized and adaptive services, leveraging technology to ensure every individual's unique requirements are met with precision and care.

features.title: Visual Support
features.description: Enhanced digital accessibility and document readability.

features.title: Auditory Assistance
features.description: Clear communication channels and assistive technologies.

features.title: Physical Accessibility
features.description: Accessible office spaces and remote service options.

features.title: Cognitive Support
features.description: Simplified processes and patient, clear explanations.

approach.title: Futuristic & Inclusive Approach
approach.description: Aladheed AlRashidiya is committed to a forward-thinking vision of govermental services. We integrate advanced AI tools and adaptive technologies to create a truly inclusive environment. Our goal is to dismantle barriers and provide seamless, empowering experiences for all People of Determination, ensuring their legal needs are addressed with the dignity and efficiency they deserve.

raalc_now.title: RAALC Now <1>Submissions and Inquiries are</1><2/> Simplified with <3>Online Token</3>

items.title: RAALC... First Step
items.description: Aladheed AlRashidiya runs the first Smart Judicial Service Center, authorized and licensed by Dubai Courts. Offers easy access with a futuristic and efficient approach, aligned with the vision of HH Sheikh Mohammed to enhance your experience. Our continuous efforts to make judicial procedures and processes seamless align with our goal to achieve 100% customer satisfaction.

items.title: Trusted Partners
items.description: Aladheed AlRashidiya is proud to be associated with Dubai Courts, providing authorized and licensed judicial services. Our partnership ensures that you receive official, reliable, and legally valid services for all your requirements.

items.title: Access & Efficiency
items.description: Experience seamless access to judicial services with our state-of-the-art facilities. Our commitment to efficiency means faster processing times and enhanced service delivery for all your legal requirements.

items.name: Ahmed K.
items.review: Aladheed AlRashidiya's team was incredibly professional and efficient. They handled my case with utmost care and precision. Highly recommended!

items.name: Fatima S.
items.review: Excellent service! They made a complex legal process seem so simple. The online token system is a game changer.

items.name: John D.
items.review: Very knowledgeable and helpful. They guided me through every step. I appreciate their dedication.

items.name: Aisha M.
items.review: The best legal consultants in Dubai! Their expertise in Sharia marriage registration is unmatched.

items.name: Raj P.
items.review: Quick, responsive, and results-driven. Aladheed AlRashidiya exceeded my expectations. Thank you for your support!

items.name: Noora H.
items.review: A reliable partner for all legal matters. Their team is approachable and always ready to assist.
